game.title: The Lost Artifact
game.description: In a faraway land, hidden deep within a treacherous forest, lies the lost artifact of ultimate power. Your quest is to journey to this land, navigate through the dangerous forest, and find the artifact before it falls into the wrong hands. Are you up for the challenge?

task.objective: Find the hidden entrance to the forest
task.description: Ask the village elder for directions to the secret entrance located behind the waterfall
Defeat the savage creatures that guard the forest path, clearing the way to the artifact's location
Unravel the cryptic clues hidden within a mysterious shrine to reveal the location of the precious artifact
Enter the sacred chamber protected by powerful traps and guardians to claim the ancient artifact
task.location: Sacred Chamber deep within the forest
